title: Understanding Personality Disorders
text: Personality disorders often involve patterns of behavior and inner experiences that deviate from the expectations of the culture, are pervasive and $$inflexible$$, and lead to distress or impairment.

title: Insight into Condition
text: Individuals with personality disorders may not recognize that their thoughts and behaviors are problematic, which can affect their willingness to seek treatment.

title: Evaluating Insight and Treatment Seeking
text: Consider whether individuals with personality disorders typically acknowledge their condition and actively seek help.
